name: Taemin 태민 and Kai 카이 (taekai) dash background
description: SHINee 샤이니 Taemin 태민 and Exo 엑소 Kai 카이 (jongin) dash background theme.
additional_info:
I made this mainly for myself (because i like to inflict PAIN on myself while on this stupid website)  but decided to share so others can share in the PAIN. :) 


I couldn't find the original source for the image, but so many people had made edits, and i really wanted to make this for myself.
~
if anyone knows the image (taekai) source or if this is your original image please message me so i can either give credit or remove. i hate not giving credit.
